description: Retention of 1no. internally illuminated fascia sign (Retrospective application)
decision_conditions: The proposed sign by virtue of siting, size, design and illumination is detrimental to the character, appearance and visual amenities of the street scene and  fails to either preserve or enhance the character or appearance of the surrounding Old Uxbridge/Windsor Street Conservation Area and the  crescent of the grade II listed Uxbridge Underground Station. The proposal is therefore contrary to Policies BE1 and HE1 of the Hillingdon Local Plan: Part One - Strategic Policies (November 2012), Policies DMHB 1, DMHB2, DMHB 4 and DMHB 13A of the Hillingdon Local Plan: Part Two - Development Management Policies (January 2020), Policy HC1 of the London Plan (2021).
